current_observation.observation_time: Last Updated on July 1, 11:50 AM MDT

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms during the morning becoming more widespread this afternoon. Heavy downpours are possible. High 78F. NE winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Isolated thunderstorms this morning, then mostly cloudy during the afternoon with heavy thunderstorms becoming likely. High 24C. NE winds shifting to S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms during the evening. Cloudy skies after midnight. Low 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms early, then cloudy skies after midnight. Low around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 81F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
